The post Discount on Discount – Up to 10% Discount on Online Payments during Black Friday! appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
The CoinCannon team, as a leading provider of online payment solutions, is honored to announce an exciting campaign for the upcoming shopping season. Running from Black Friday, November 29, 2024, to Cyber Monday, December 2, 2024, the campaign offers users a 10% discount, up to $10, on payments made through its Online Payment service.  

Black Friday and Cyber Monday: A Global Shopping Phenomenon  

Black Friday and Cyber Monday mark the busiest shopping days of the year, where retailers and service providers offer incredible deals. While consumers rush to grab discounts on all types of services or products, CoinCannon is bringing this festive spirit to online payments, making it easier and more affordable for users to complete essential transactions.  

CoinCannon Online Payment: Simplifying Transactions Worldwide  

jolixo’s Online Payment service has been designed for users in countries like Russia, Iran, etc where accessing trusted international payment methods such as PayPal, Visa, or MasterCard can be difficult or even countries such as India, Malta or Hungary where security and privacy of online payments have a crucial rule.

By enabling payments with cryptocurrencies and handling the conversion process, CoinCannon eliminates the need for complex account setups or identity verifications.  

How It Works:  

1. Users pay with their preferred cryptocurrency.  

2. They select a payment method (Visa, MasterCard, or PayPal).  

3. CoinCannon converts the payment and completes the transaction on their behalf.  

This service is fast, secure, and designed to make international payments accessible to everyone, regardless of regional restrictions.  

Campaign Details  

jolixo’s Black Friday to Cyber Monday campaign provides customers with a 10% discount, up to $10, on payments made through the Online Payment service. 

This means Discount on Discount!!: Get CoinCannon’s Black Friday discount on usual Black Friday’s Discounts!!

  •  Start Date: November 29, 2024 (Black Friday).  
  •  End Date: December 2, 2024 (Cyber Monday).  

The campaign is open to both individuals and businesses, making it a valuable opportunity to save on essential transactions.  

Who Should Take Advantage of This Campaign?  

jolixo’s Black Friday campaign is perfect for:  

Personal Users:  

  •  Gamers: Pay for premium accounts, in-game purchases, and subscriptions.  
  •  Freelancers: Manage payments for tools, software, or services easily.  
  •  Travelers: Book flights, accommodations, and tours effortlessly.  
  •  Students: Pay tuition fees or purchase educational materials.  
  •  Entertainment Enthusiasts: Access streaming, gaming, and betting platforms.  

Businesses:  

  •  Hosting Services: Simplify hosting and VPS payments.  
  •  Invoice Payments: Pay vendors smoothly and securely.  
  •  Payroll Management: Send employee salaries globally without barriers.  

Why This Campaign Matters  

jolixo’s Black Friday to Cyber Monday campaign goes beyond just offering discounts. It provides a solution for users in restricted regions to enjoy the convenience of international payment methods while saving money.  

With CoinCannon, customers can avoid: 

✅Complicated account setups.  

✅Long-lasting verification processes.  

✅Extra transaction fees associated with funding accounts.  

This Black Friday To Cyber Monday, CoinCannon invites individuals and businesses to experience a seamless and cost effective way to manage their online payments.  

Don’t miss out on this limited time offer! Visit CoinCannon from November 29 to December 2, 2024, and enjoy secure, fast, and discounted transactions on Online Payment Service. 

The post Discount on Discount – Up to 10% Discount on Online Payments during Black Friday! appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: Online Payment: A Simple Payment Solution
item.dc:creator: Leyli Mamikhani
item.description:
In today’s interconnected world, online payments are the heart of global commerce. However, for many users in countries like Russia, Iran, Venezuela, and Cuba, accessing trusted international payment gateways such as PayPal, Visa, and MasterCard remains a significant challenge. These obstacles, often caused by laws, currency restrictions, or regional rules, leave individuals and businesses struggling […]

The post Online Payment: A Simple Payment Solution appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
In today’s interconnected world, online payments are the heart of global commerce. However, for many users in countries like Russia, Iran, Venezuela, and Cuba, accessing trusted international payment gateways such as PayPal, Visa, and MasterCard remains a significant challenge. These obstacles, often caused by laws, currency restrictions, or regional rules, leave individuals and businesses struggling to complete essential online transactions.   

Recognizing these difficulties, CoinCannon offers an innovative solution: Online Payment, a service that allows users to avoid traditional barriers and complete payments quickly, securely, and without the need for challenging account setups or verifications.

 What Is Online Payment?  

Online payment refers to the process of transferring money digitally to pay for goods, services, or subscriptions. From PayPal and Visa to cryptocurrencies and Perfect Money, online payment methods  respond  to different needs like:  

  • Visa and MasterCard: Ideal for global shoppers, travelers, and businesses.  
  • PayPal: A popular choice for freelancers and gamers due to its versatility.  
  • Cryptocurrencies: Favored by privacy-focused users and tech-savvy individuals.  
  • Perfect Money: Frequently used in hosting, VPS services, and entertainment platforms.  

While these payment methods are powerful, accessing and managing them can be difficult—especially in restricted regions. This is where CoinCannon comes in.  

 How Does CoinCannon Online Payment Work?  

CoinCannon simplified online payments with its shortcut service, enabling users to make payments using cryptocurrencies while CoinCannon takes care of the rest.

This means users no longer need to have an existing account or go through the effort of creating a new one, funding it (and paying transaction fees in the process!), and then finally making their payment. CoinCannon Online Payment simplifies this challenging process, saving both time and effort. Here’s how it works:

Step 1: You Can Pay with Cryptocurrency 

Begin by selecting your preferred cryptocurrency, There is a wide variety of cryptocurrencies you can choose.

Step 2: Choose the Payment Method

Select your preferred payment method, such as Visa Card, MasterCard, or PayPal. Once you’ve made your choice, provide us with the necessary link and details of your order, and we’ll take care of the payment for you.

Step 3: CoinCannon Converts the Payment

The platform processes the payment and converts it into the required format.

Step 4: Payment Is Completed via Preferred Method

 CoinCannon delivers the payment using Visa, MasterCard or PayPal —no account setup required.  

This simple procedure removes all barriers, making online payments possible to everyone, no matter their location or restrictions.

 How Online Payment Helps You As A Payment Solution  

jolixo’s Online Payment service is designed to handle key user issues such as:

  • Global Accessibility: Perfect for users in restricted regions who cannot access traditional payment methods.  
  • No Account Setup Required: Skip the challenges of creating and verifying accounts on platforms like PayPal.  
  • Versatile Options: Choose from a range of supported payment methods to suit your needs.  
  • Fast and Secure: Payments are handled quickly, with secure systems to protect your funds.  
  • No Identity Verification: Enjoy the freedom to pay without the burden of identity checks or document submissions.  
  • No KYC Needed.
  • Skip Additional Fees: When you charge an account before making a payment, you often pay extra transaction fees. However, you can avoid these extra fees and save money by using CoinCannon’s direct payment method.

 What Payment Methods Are Supported?  

CoinCannon offers a large selection of payment options to provide all users flexibility: 

  • Visa Card  
  • MasterCard  
  • PayPal   

With this diverse range, CoinCannon caters to personal and professional use cases, from individual transactions to large-scale business payments.  

 Who Is This Service Designed For?  

jolixo’s Online Payment service is designed for a wide range of audience:  

 Personal Users:

  • Gamers: Pay for subscriptions, in-game purchases, and premium accounts.  
  • Freelancers: Handle payments for tools, software, or client services effortlessly.  
  • Entertainment Enthusiasts: Access platforms like betting, streaming, and gaming sites without restrictions.  
  • Travelers: Manage bookings, tours, and accommodations conveniently.  
  • Students: Pay tuition, purchase educational materials, or access learning tools.  

 Businesses: 

  • Hosting and VPS Services: Manage hosting fees and virtual server payments seamlessly.  
  • Invoice Payments: Pay vendor invoices quickly using cryptocurrencies.  
  • Payroll Management: Ensure smooth salary payments to employees worldwide.  

 Why CoinCannon Online Payment?  

jolixo’s Online Payment service is a reliable and versatile solution, especially for users in restricted regions who face barriers in accessing international payment platforms. By removing the need for account creation, verification, or funding, the service provides a truly simple experience. It supports a wide range of popular payment methods, ensuring compatibility with various user needs.

With effortless cryptocurrency integration, CoinCannon allows users to convert their crypto payments into traditional payment methods, such as Visa, MasterCard, or PayPal, ensuring smooth and efficient transactions. The platform emphasizes security and privacy, employing advanced protocols to protect your payments. Additionally, CoinCannon offers special features such as crypto exchange and digital payment solutions, making it an ideal choice for all your online payment needs.

 Conclusion  

jolixo’s Online Payment service offers a simple solution to the challenges of modern online transactions. Whether you’re an individual or a business, CoinCannon simplifies payments, avoiding restrictions and removing unnecessary steps.  

Say goodbye to the headaches of online payments—choose CoinCannon today and enjoy secure, fast, and effortless transactions!  

The post Online Payment: A Simple Payment Solution appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: All About Perfect Money
item.dc:creator: Leyli Mamikhani
item.description:
Welcome to your ultimate guide to Perfect Money – your ticket to hassle-free online transactions!  In this article, we’re here to walk you through everything there is to know about Perfect Money, from its beginnings to its standout features, perks, and security measures.  Whether you’re a seasoned pro eager to unlock more from your Perfect […]

The post All About Perfect Money appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to your ultimate guide to Perfect Money – your ticket to hassle-free online transactions!

 In this article, we’re here to walk you through everything there is to know about Perfect Money, from its beginnings to its standout features, perks, and security measures. 

Whether you’re a seasoned pro eager to unlock more from your Perfect Money experience or a newcomer curious about how it can simplify your online finances, you’re in good hands.

 So let’s embark on this journey into the world of Perfect Money together!

What is Perfect Money?

Perfect Money is an e-currency used for making payments on the internet. It is widely accepted as payment option by countless platforms. With Perfect Money, you can do a lot! 

Be it transferring funds to others or pay for goods and services. Or how about buying cryptocurrencies or even buying fiat currencies. It is a seriously popular payment method for online users. An additional capability is to loan and receipt issuance throughout the system. 

The biggest downside of Perfect Money, however, is that you cannot cash Perfect money to your bank account on its website directly. For that, you will need a platform like CoinCannon to exchange your Perfect Money to PayPal and other e-currencies.

How Dose Perfect Money Works?

Perfect Money as a user-friendly digital payment system function as an electronic wallet, allowing users to securely send and receive payments with ease. 

To get started, simply sign up for an account and fund it through various methods like bank transfers or cryptocurrency exchanges. Sending money to friends or paying for goods and services is quick and straightforward – just enter the recipient’s details and the amount, and you’re good to go. 

Perfect Money supports multiple currencies and offers competitive exchange rates for currency conversion. With robust security measures in place, such as encryption and two-factor authentication, you can trust that your transactions are safe and secure. 

Plus, withdrawing funds is a breeze with various withdrawal options available. Whether you’re an individual or a business, Perfect Money provides a convenient and reliable solution for your online payment needs.

The Benefits of Using Perfect Money for Online Transactions

With Perfect Money, enjoy the benefits of seamless online transactions and peace of mind knowing that your payments are handled efficiently and securely. So let me tell you about the advantages of using perfect money for your online transactions:

  1. Effortless Transactions: Enjoy a hassle-free payment experience with Perfect Money’s streamlined process for sending and receiving funds online.
  2. Speedy Payments: Say goodbye to delays – Perfect Money ensures swift transactions, allowing you to complete payments quickly and efficiently. 
  3. Versatile Usage: Whether you’re paying bills, shopping online, or sending money to friends and family, Perfect Money accommodates a variety of transaction needs. 
  4. Top-notch Security: Rest easy knowing that your financial information is safe and secure with Perfect Money’s advanced encryption and robust security measures. 
  5. User-Friendly Interface: Navigate with ease through Perfect Money’s intuitive platform, making it simple to manage your finances and transactions. 
  6. Convenient Currency Options: Perfect Money supports multiple currencies, offering flexibility and convenience for users around the globe.
  7. Trusted by Millions: Join the millions of satisfied users who rely on Perfect Money for their online payment needs and experience the convenience firsthand.

One of the most popular exchange directions on Perfect Money is “To exchange Perfect Money to PayPal.” For more information about this exchange direction on CoinCannon, you can read: “How to Exchange Perfect Money USD to PayPal USD.“

Security Features of Perfect Money: Keeping Your Funds Safe

In the case of transactions, of course security is the most important! Perfect Money with robust security features in place, prioritizes the safety and security of your funds, providing you with peace of mind when conducting transactions online.

Here are the security features of Perfect Money, ensuring the safety of your funds:

  • Advanced Encryption: Perfect Money employs state-of-the-art encryption technology to safeguard your sensitive data and financial information from unauthorized access.
  • Two-Factor Authentication (2FA): Enhance your account security with 2FA, adding an extra layer of protection by requiring a secondary verification method, such as a code sent to your mobile device, in addition to your password. 
  • Transaction Monitoring: Perfect Money continuously monitors transactions for suspicious activity, helping to detect and prevent fraudulent transactions in real-time.
  • Secure Login: Protect your account from unauthorized access with secure login protocols, including CAPTCHA verification and session timeouts, ensuring that only authorized users can access your account. 
  • IP Restrictions: Customize security settings by restricting account access to specific IP addresses or IP ranges, preventing unauthorized logins from unknown locations.
  • Account Verification: Verify your identity and account details through Perfect Money’s verification process, adding an extra layer of security to your account and transactions.

Exploring Perfect Money Exchange Options and Rates

Let’s take a friendly stroll through Perfect Money’s exchange options and rates! 

With Perfect Money, you’re in for a treat when it comes to currency conversion. Enjoy the convenience of exchanging between multiple currencies seamlessly, right from the comfort of your account. 

What’s even better? Perfect Money offers competitive exchange rates, ensuring you get the best value for your money every time.

Need to convert funds in a hurry? No problem! With real-time exchange options, you can make currency conversions instantly whenever the need arises. 

Plus, with a variety of exchange methods available, including bank transfers, cryptocurrency exchanges, and more, you’ll have the flexibility to choose the option that suits you best. And don’t worry about hidden fees – Perfect Money maintains a transparent fee structure, keeping you informed every step of the way. 

So go ahead, manage your funds with ease and efficiency, all while enjoying the friendly and intuitive interface of Perfect Money.

Common Questions About Perfect Money: FAQs Answered

Let’s address some common questions about Perfect Money:

What is Perfect Money?

Perfect Money is a digital payment system that allows users to securely send and receive payments online, similar to an electronic wallet.

How do I sign up for a Perfect Money account?

Signing up for a Perfect Money account is easy! Simply visit the Perfect Money website, click on the “Sign Up” button, and follow the prompts to create your account.

What currencies does Perfect Money support?

Perfect Money supports multiple currencies, including USD, EUR, GBP, and others, allowing users to transact in their preferred currency.

How can I fund my Perfect Money account?

You can fund your Perfect Money account through various methods, including bank transfers, cryptocurrency exchanges, and other online payment systems.

Is Perfect Money safe to use?

Yes, Perfect Money prioritizes security and employs advanced encryption technology to protect users’ sensitive information and funds.

Are there any fees associated with using Perfect Money?

While Perfect Money does charge fees for certain transactions, the fee structure is transparent, and users are informed of any fees before completing transactions.

Can I withdraw funds from my Perfect Money account?

from your Perfect Money account through various withdrawal options, such as bank transfers, prepaid cards, and cryptocurrency withdrawals.

Is Perfect Money available worldwide?

Yes, Perfect Money is available to users worldwide, allowing individuals and businesses from different countries to access its services.

How can I contact Perfect Money customer support?

If you have any questions or need assistance, you can reach out to Perfect Money customer support through their website or by email.

Can I use Perfect Money for online shopping and payments?

Yes, Perfect Money can be used for online shopping and payments at merchants that accept Perfect Money as a payment method.

That being said, you can also buy cryptocurrencies with Perfect Money USD on CoinCannon.

If you have any questions about Perfect Money, check out FAQ on Perfect Money Exchange Services

The post All About Perfect Money appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Could Surge to $112,000, Predicts CryptoQuant CEO
item.dc:creator: Leyli Mamikhani
item.description:
Key Points: In an insightful analysis shared by CryptoQuant CEO Ki Young Ju, Bitcoin is poised for a remarkable ascent to $112,000 in 2024, primarily fueled by the anticipated influx of funds from exchange-traded funds (ETFs). Highlighting the pivotal role of ETF cash inflows, Ju predicts a monthly surge of $9.5 billion, augmenting Bitcoin’s actual […]

The post Bitcoin Price Could Surge to $112,000, Predicts CryptoQuant CEO appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • CEO of CryptoQuant, Ki Young Ju, forecasts Bitcoin’s price to soar up to $112,000 by the end of 2024, driven by anticipated inflows from Spot ETFs.
  • A potential monthly inflow of $9.5 billion from ETFs could augment Bitcoin’s actual value by $114 billion, potentially propelling the price to $112,000.
  • Ju presents an optimistic projection ranging from $104,000 to $112,000, with a more conservative estimate between $55,000 and $59,000.

In an insightful analysis shared by CryptoQuant CEO Ki Young Ju, Bitcoin is poised for a remarkable ascent to $112,000 in 2024, primarily fueled by the anticipated influx of funds from exchange-traded funds (ETFs). Highlighting the pivotal role of ETF cash inflows, Ju predicts a monthly surge of $9.5 billion, augmenting Bitcoin’s actual capitalization by a staggering $114 billion annually.

Ju’s forecast paints a bullish picture of Bitcoin’s trajectory, envisioning a potential surge to $112,000 by the year’s end. Despite speculation regarding possible exits from Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC), Ju remains optimistic about Bitcoin’s price rally, projecting a substantial increase of $76 billion in accurate capitalization. This could elevate Bitcoin’s current capitalization from $451 billion to between $527 billion and $565 billion.

Ju remains confident in Bitcoin’s resilience despite potential fluctuations, foreseeing a price range between $104,000 and $112,000 fueled by ETF inflows. Even in a more conservative scenario, Bitcoin could still maintain a strong position, trading between $55,000 and $59,000.

Amidst this anticipation, Bitcoin is already displaying signs of momentum, with its current weekly candle reflecting a gain of 12.58%. Trading above $48,000, Bitcoin’s volume in the last 24 hours has surged to $20.65 billion, hinting at growing investor interest and market activity.

Source: coinpedia

The post Bitcoin Price Could Surge to $112,000, Predicts CryptoQuant CEO appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: Ripple Ordered to Disclose Financial Information Amid SEC Lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Leyli Mamikhani
item.description:
In response to a recent court order, Ripple faces the obligation to disclose further insights into the financial standing and transactions involving its native cryptocurrency, XRP. This mandate follows a request from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), with Judge Analiza Torres previously ruling that the dissemination of XRP tokens to organizations constituted an […]

The post Ripple Ordered to Disclose Financial Information Amid SEC Lawsuit appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • Ripple ordered to disclose financial details and XRP sales following SEC request.
  • Judge ruled distribution of XRP tokens to organizations as “unlawful sale of securities.”
  • Ripple must submit 2022-2023 financial reports and XRP sales contracts.
  • Court approved SEC motion to compel Ripple’s compliance.
  • Ripple contested ruling, citing objections as “untimely” and “unnecessary.”
  • John Deaton proposed $10 million fine for Ripple.
  • Lawsuit’s outcome crucial for Ripple and XRP token, impacting market value.
  • XRP price declined from $3.40 to $0.41 in response to developments.

In response to a recent court order, Ripple faces the obligation to disclose further insights into the financial standing and transactions involving its native cryptocurrency, XRP.

This mandate follows a request from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), with Judge Analiza Torres previously ruling that the dissemination of XRP tokens to organizations constituted an “unlawful sale of securities.” However, transactions involving XRP on exchanges and among retail traders were excluded from this classification.

Under the court order, Ripple is now required to furnish its financial reports spanning the years 2022-2023, alongside contracts pertaining to organizational sales of XRP. These disclosures aim to illuminate critical details such as revenue generated from token sales.

Ripple’s opposition to this ruling signals the onset of a legal confrontation.

In a significant development within the ongoing lawsuit, U.S. District Judge Annalisa Torres has granted approval to the SEC’s motion, compelling Ripple to furnish additional financial statements covering the period from 2022 to 2023, along with agreements concerning “institutional sales” of XRP.

The SEC contends that this supplementary financial data is indispensable in determining suitable penalties and compensatory measures.

Despite Ripple’s objections, deeming the SEC’s requests as “untimely” and “unnecessary,” the court emphasizes the importance of this information for the litigation process. Notably, John Deaton, representing Pro-XRP holders, has recommended a fine of approximately $10 million for Ripple.

As the SEC gains access to further financial insights from Ripple, the lawsuit enters a pivotal juncture, carrying significant implications for both Ripple and the XRP token. Consequently, the XRP price has witnessed a notable decline, plummeting from its recent high of $3.40 to $0.41.

Source: coinpedia

The post Ripple Ordered to Disclose Financial Information Amid SEC Lawsuit appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: Everything About NotCoin: Play and Earn Free Coins
item.dc:creator: Leyli Mamikhani
item.description:
Discover the rising popularity of “NotCoin” and learn how to play and earn virtual currency effortlessly! NotCoin, a Telegram bot game designed for mining virtual coins, has surged from a mere 6 to an impressive 100 on Google Trends within just seven days. With over 4 million players joining the frenzy in a week, NotCoin […]

The post Everything About NotCoin: Play and Earn Free Coins appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Discover the rising popularity of “NotCoin” and learn how to play and earn virtual currency effortlessly!

NotCoin, a Telegram bot game designed for mining virtual coins, has surged from a mere 6 to an impressive 100 on Google Trends within just seven days.
With over 4 million players joining the frenzy in a week, NotCoin has become a sensation on the TON platform, accessible as a bot on Telegram. Dive into this exciting game where every tap earns you virtual coins, offering a fun and rewarding experience.

Key Points

  • NotCoin’s remarkable journey in Google Trends and its emergence as a viral sensation on Telegram.
  • The inception of NotCoin on November 10, 2023, with the public game release on January 1.
  • A staggering increase in user base, with daily active accounts surpassing 1.5 million and total players exceeding 4 million by January 8.

Beyond these astounding statistics lies the essence of NotCoin’s success, intricately tied to user expectations and its seamless integration within the Telegram community. The choice of the name “NotCoin” may have been influenced by marketing strategies employed by ANALOS and similar projects, capitalizing on the contrasting appeal with the TON blockchain. The recent surge in meme tokens further underscores this trend, contributing to NotCoin’s exponential growth.

Earning NotCoin

Unlock the potential to earn NotCoin effortlessly by engaging with the NotCoin Telegram bot. Follow these simple steps to accumulate NotCoins and delve into the captivating world of virtual currency:

  1. Open the NotCoin Telegram bot.
  2. Click “Let’s Go” from the main menu.
  3. Every tap on the page earns you NotCoins, with each tap consuming one unit of energy. Anticipate future airdrops on the TON blockchain based on your accumulated points.

Additional Earning Methods

Enhance your NotCoin mining experience with various boosters designed to maximize efficiency:

  • Energy regeneration and turbo mode.
  • Multi-stroke tapping for accelerated earnings.
  • Automated tap-bot for seamless coin farming.
  • In-game missions and achievements for additional rewards.

Team Building in NotCoin

Join forces with fellow NotCoin enthusiasts and create or join squads to amplify your earnings. Squads function as vibrant communities of miners, with each player’s contributions boosting the team’s overall ranking. Create your squad or join existing ones to reap the rewards and foster a sense of camaraderie within the NotCoin community.

NotCoin‘s FAQs

  • How can users purchase NotCoin tokens?
    As of now, NotCoin tokens aren’t available for purchase, with pre-launch transactions limited to NOT or equivalent currencies.
  • Is NotCoin a scam?
    While comprehensive information is still forthcoming, NotCoin boasts a robust user base and enjoys active support from influencers, indicating promising prospects.

Conclusion

NotCoin’s meteoric rise hints at its potential to become a significant player in the digital currency landscape. Stay informed and seize the opportunity to earn valuable coins, as speculation suggests a promising future for NotCoin in the digital realm.

The post Everything About NotCoin: Play and Earn Free Coins appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: Revealing Arthur Hayes’ Top Altcoin Picks for 2024
item.dc:creator: Leyli Mamikhani
item.description:
As the bearish trend of 2024 unfolds, Arthur Hayes, the former CEO of Bitmax, has shared insights into his chosen altcoins for the year. Departing from his Bitcoin focus, Hayes is now eyeing strategic investments in Solana and Bonk, signaling a shift in his cryptocurrency portfolio. In a recent press release, Hayes expressed concern about […]

The post Revealing Arthur Hayes’ Top Altcoin Picks for 2024 appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
As the bearish trend of 2024 unfolds, Arthur Hayes, the former CEO of Bitmax, has shared insights into his chosen altcoins for the year. Departing from his Bitcoin focus, Hayes is now eyeing strategic investments in Solana and Bonk, signaling a shift in his cryptocurrency portfolio.

In a recent press release, Hayes expressed concern about Bitcoin’s struggle to maintain its position above $40,000, predicting potential further declines in the upcoming weeks. In response to this market sentiment, he has diversified his investments into the promising altcoins Solana and Bonk.

Hayes anticipates a 30% correction from Bitcoin’s recent high of $48,000 in 2024, especially following the approval of Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs). He identifies potential support levels ranging from $30,000 to $35,000. Taking a proactive stance, Hayes has already exited positions in Solana and Bonk at $35,000, even if it meant a modest loss.

Positioning Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies as the last bastion of global open markets, Hayes asserts their ability to predict better fluctuations in the dollar’s liquidity compared to traditional financial markets. In the event of Bitcoin falling below $35,000, Hayes plans to invest in Solana (SOL), an innovative contract platform, and Dogwifhat (WIF), a meme asset on Ethereum, employing a “fishing from the bottom” strategy.

“I would choose Solana and WIF over Bitcoin”

Arthur Hayes

Dogwifhat is trading at $0.343, showing a significant 50% increase in the last 24 hours. In contrast, Solana is priced at $86.16, reflecting a 5.5% uptick from the previous day. While Dogwifhat’s recent price movements have displayed volatility between $0.330 and $0.355, some experts predict a potential return to around $0.45, similar to mid-January levels. Despite Hayes’ optimism, technical indicators offer mixed signals, introducing an element of uncertainty to Dogwifhat’s future price.

The post Revealing Arthur Hayes’ Top Altcoin Picks for 2024 appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: Lark Davis: Ethereum’s 2024 Wealth Potential – Watch the Video!
item.dc:creator: Leyli Mamikhani
item.description:
Lark Davis – the well-known audacious researcher and forecaster of renowned digital currency analysts – ecstatic digital currency enthusiasts and investors regarding his prediction of Ethereum in 2024. In his most recent YouTube video, Davis dug into the untapped potential of Ethereum and insisted that crypto bases are the way to get rich with Ethereum. […]

The post Lark Davis: Ethereum’s 2024 Wealth Potential – Watch the Video! appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Lark Davis – the well-known audacious researcher and forecaster of renowned digital currency analysts – ecstatic digital currency enthusiasts and investors regarding his prediction of Ethereum in 2024.

In his most recent YouTube video, Davis dug into the untapped potential of Ethereum and insisted that crypto bases are the way to get rich with Ethereum. However, this is by no means an easy or straightforward path.

Ethereum price path in 2024

According to Davis, Ethereum can reach $10,000 to $15,000. He emphasizes that simply buying and holding Ethereum is not a golden ticket to wealth. At Ethereum’s current price of $2,295, investors are likely to see a 600% return, which is very remarkable. But Davis points to more lucrative opportunities.

There are fundamental financial changes in Ethereum layer two solutions. Networks built on top of Ethereum to increase its scalability and efficiency. He emphasizes that these layer two platforms, such as StarkNet, ZK Sync, and others, are much more than Ethereum. They cause the explosive growth of the price of this currency.

Prospects for 2024 Ethereum price growth

According to Davis, these Layer 2 networks should be monitored for new token listings. He mentions Celestia as an example, which witnessed a 500% gain just one month after going public. Keeping an eye on these new listings can be significant for people hoping to make substantial earnings rapidly.

Davis also highlights the possibility of airdrops in the Layer 2 space. He shares details on how to take part in these airdrops by chain activities and staking, such as the Manta Network and zkSync programs. Compared to conventional ETH investments, these airdrops have the potential to be more profitable, more immediate, and generate greater returns.

The value of the largest altcoin was $2,295 at the time of publication. A few analysts expect it to increase to $2,500 in the final five days of the year. The weekly and daily charts for Ethereum are currently showing green, and the Fear and Greed indicator is shifting in favor of Greed, indicating strong bullishness. Furthermore, Ether is anticipated to be among the leaders of the anticipated uptrend in 2024.

Source:  coinpedia

The post Lark Davis: Ethereum’s 2024 Wealth Potential – Watch the Video! appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: Analysis of Bitcoin’s Continued Drop Amid ETF Approval Expectations
item.dc:creator: Leyli Mamikhani
item.description:
Despite the most recent changes regarding the Bitcoin ETF, the landscape of virtual currencies is once more in the midst of a profound shift. The most valuable cryptocurrency in the world of digital assets, Bitcoin, has recently declined, losing more than 2.4% of its value. This year has witnessed a stunning 156% acquisition in the […]

The post Analysis of Bitcoin’s Continued Drop Amid ETF Approval Expectations appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Despite the most recent changes regarding the Bitcoin ETF, the landscape of virtual currencies is once more in the midst of a profound shift. The most valuable cryptocurrency in the world of digital assets, Bitcoin, has recently declined, losing more than 2.4% of its value.

This year has witnessed a stunning 156% acquisition in the value of the most popular digital currency, Bitcoin. The primary cause for these changes is the conjecture that the launch of ETFs could generate a new wave of demand. Undoubtedly, not all of this can be considered entirely beneficial because there is a lot of speculation in the market on whether or not the approval of these ETFs would lead to profit-taking strategies. Such speculation can potentially negatively impact the shifts in the value of bitcoin.

CryptoQuant described what happened as a possible “sell the news” incident, referring to the wave that formed upon the news.

The term used above refers to a well-known phenomenon in the capital markets: the rising sentiment, leverage, and asset prices before a positive event, followed by a sharp decline in prices.

This is because smart traders take advantage of overloaded long deals, ensnaring leveraged traders and pressuring them to sell out or liquidate during drops.

The announcement that an ETF for Bitcoin is being approved can be seen as beneficial since it allows institutions to start investing in the cryptocurrency, increasing buying pressure.

The memo stated that “Bitcoin short holders are experiencing an unrealistic 30% profit margin, which has historically been before price corrections (areas marked with red circles).” Furthermore, short-term holders keep spending Bitcoin profitably, and returns typically materialize once short-term losses are realized.

Conclusion

ETF Approval: What to Expect from Bitcoin?

  • Bitcoin has recently declined, losing 2.4% of its value, and is currently trading at $42,400
  • 2023 has witnessed a stunning 156% acquisition in Bitcoin’s value
  • The main cause of this decline can be the conjecture of the launch of ETFs and the newly generated wave of demand.
  • Bitcoin short holders are experiencing an unrealistic 30% profit margin.
  • CryptoQuant described what happened as a possible “sell the news” incident, referring to the wave that formed upon the news.
  • Lots of speculation in the market on whether or not the approval of these ETFs would lead to profit-taking strategies that can potentially negatively impact the shifts in the value of bitcoin.

The post Analysis of Bitcoin’s Continued Drop Amid ETF Approval Expectations appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
